name: Darshan Sirigeri
review: The food and service were very good. A must recommend from my side.

name: Karthik
review: Mini Shrimp Rolls and Brownie dessert are a must try along with Vanila Strawberry Custard.

name: Santhosh
review: This is one of those restaurants which amazed me truly in the sense of food.The service was great at the beginning.The food is good, the beverage service is great. A must recommendation.

name: Prit Patel
review: The food here is GREAT!! I have ordered from there twice.

name: Darshan
review: I love your restaurant. The food here is awsum.
